channel.title: Homes on Siddharth Vij
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Siddharth Vij

item.description: Welcome to my website! I am an Assistant Professor of Finance in the Terry College of Business at the University of Georgia. I conduct primarily empirical research in banking and corporate finance. I completed a Ph.D. in Finance at the New York University Stern School of Business in May 2018.

item.title: Working Papers
item.description: Regulatory Risk Perception and Small Business Lending (with Joseph Kalmenovitz) [Paper] Risk Management with Variable Capital Utilization and Procyclical Collateral Capacity (with Guojun Chen, and Zhongjin Lu ) [Paper] Foreign Currency Borrowing of Corporations as Carry Trades: Evidence from India (with Viral V. Acharya) [Paper] Unearthing Zombies (with Nirupama Kulkarni, SK Ritadhi, and Katherine Waldock ) [Paper] Acquiring Failed Banks [Paper] Lending to Influence Politicians: County-Level Evidence [Paper]
